description: Father Sergiy Romanov entered the women's monastery in Russia with help from armed supporters.
title: Coronavirus: Covid-denying priest Father Sergiy Romanov seizes Russian monastery
title_page: Coronavirus: Covid-denying priest Father Sergiy Romanov seizes Russian monastery - BBC News
maintext: Legally, the priest has changed his name to Nikolai Romanov, in honour of Russia's last Tsar Nicholas II. The former emperor and his family were thought to have been buried outside Yekaterinburg after their murders in 1918, near the Sredneuralsk site, and Fr Sergiy is seen as the figurehead of the shadowy "tsar worshipper" movement within the church.
